segment.source: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.
segment.target: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.

segment.source: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.
segment.target: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.

segment.source: Data is provided in .tsv (tab-separated values) files, which can be opened in a number of programs.
segment.target: Data is provided in .tsv (tab-separated values) files, which can be opened in a number of programs.

segment.source: First, select the app for which you'd like to download info.
segment.target: First, select the app for which you'd like to download info.

segment.source: Tip You can choose to download info all of your apps or a specific app.
segment.target: Tip You can choose to download info all of your apps or a specific app.

segment.source: Note that you're not limited to downloading a report for the app which you were working in when you accessed the Download reports page in its Analytics section.
segment.target: Note that you're not limited to downloading a report for the app which you were working in when you accessed the Download reports page in its Analytics section.

segment.source: Select one of the available reports.
segment.target: Select one of the available reports.

segment.source: Select from the available values in the Aggregation level and Date range drop-down lists.
segment.target: Select from the available values in the Aggregation level and Date range drop-down lists.

segment.source: Note that the options may vary depending on the type of report you've selected.
segment.target: Note that the options may vary depending on the type of report you've selected.

segment.source: Click the Download reports button, and then save or open the .tsv file.
segment.target: Click the Download reports button, and then save or open the .tsv file.
